abstract: National League baseball playoffs draw significantly more viewers than American League games and trend is likely to continue into next round of competition.
lead_paragraph: The viewership for the matchup between the Cardinals and the Cubs and the one between the Mets and the Dodgers bodes well for the N.L.C.S.

headline.main: Both National League Series Score in the Ratings
headline.print_headline: 2 N.L. Series Score Higher Than A.L. in TV Ratings

snippet: The viewership for the matchup between the Cardinals and the Cubs and the one between the Mets and the Dodgers bodes well for the N.L.C.S.
